Hei wrote:
> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "Hei" <structurechart@...> wrote:
> 
>>Hi, I am pretty new to Heritrix.
>>Once awhile I get the error: Heritrix(-63)-Prerequisite unschedulable
>>failure, what does it mean?
>>I looked up the user manual here:
>>http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.html.  It is
>>not too explicit, so I am not sure how to fix it.
>>Then, I looked at code here:
>>
> 
> http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/datamodel/FetchStatusCodes.html#38
> 
>>The comment says that code is returned if DNS lookup fails.
>>So how can I fix it?
>>Thanks in advance.
>>
> 
> Oops forgot to provide more info about my setting:
> DecidingScope:
> - RejectDecideRule()
> - OnDomainsDecideRule(decision=Accept,seeds-as-surt-prefixes=true)
> 
> I used to have more rules, but for debugging purpose, I shrinked down
> to 2 rules.  But still fail...sign..
> 
>
